name: Maw of Malmortius

passives.effects: If you would take {{as|magic damage}} that would reduce you below {{as|30% of your '''maximum''' health}}, you first gain a {{tip|shield}} that absorbs {{as|{{rd|200|150}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{rd|150%|{{fd|112.5}}%}} '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|magic damage}} for 3 seconds.
